content:
These are common mushrooms found beneath trees.
When seeking refuge from the harsh midday sun,
I often encounter them under the shade.
info: 幻雪关于菌种闲聊_幻雪流程闲聊1

content:
Perhaps in the future, with the right gardening soil,
we might be able to cultivate fresh mushrooms from mycelium spores.
Yeep~! No, I'm not hungry or anything.
info: 幻雪关于菌种闲聊_幻雪流程闲聊1

content:
I discovered a tiny,
sun-averse creature just like myself,
an adorable, perfectly round little thing.
info: 幻雪关于菌种闲聊_幻雪流程闲聊1

content:
<color=#d3b037>{me}</color>, do you like mushroom soup?
It's quite tasty, but...
I think we've gathered mushroom spawn that hasn't fully matured yet.
info: 幻雪关于菌种闲聊_幻雪流程闲聊1
